TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SubMenuStyleCollection extends System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection

summary.span: Represents a collection of objects in a control.

span.span: Represents a collection of objects in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于存储和管理一系列中的对象控件。The class is used to store and manage a collection of objects in a control. 控件使用类的基础数据类型作为属性。The control uses the class as the underlying data type of the property. 属性提供了其他样式选项除了和属性。The property provides additional style choices in addition to the and properties. 中的第一个样式对应于菜单上的第一个级别的子菜单样式的集合。The first style in the collection corresponds to the submenu style for the first level of the menu. 集合中的第二个样式对应的菜单中，依次类推的第二个级别的子菜单样式。The second style in the collection corresponds to the submenu style for the second level of the menu, and so on. 属性通常用于生成导航菜单中的，如在 Web 站点图，其中某一级别的菜单项应具有相同的外观，而不考虑是否具有子菜单。The property is most often used to generate a navigation menu, like a Web site map, where menu items at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have submenus. 类继承其大多数成员从类。The class inherits most of its members from the class. 有关继承的成员的详细信息，请参阅集合。For more information on the inherited members, see the collection. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类，以指定在子菜单的样式设置控件基于子菜单的级别。The following example demonstrates how to use the class to specify the style settings for the submenus in a control based on the submenu's level. 在此示例中，属性返回对象。In this example, the property returns a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuLevelSubMenuStyles#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuLevelSubMenuStyles/CS/menulevelsubmenustylescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuLevelSubMenuStyles#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuLevelSubMenuStyles/VB/menulevelsubmenustylesvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是用于创建一个帮助器函数对应于指定索引的数据类型。The method is a helper function that is used to create an of the data type that corresponds to the specified index. 索引通常由使用方法来创建支持的数据类型，然后搜索所需的数据类型的数组的数组。The index is often determined by using the method to create an array of supported data types and then searching the array for the desired data type. `index`参数不使用在此实现中的方法，将被忽略。The `index` parameter is not used in this implementation of the method and is ignored. 应始终传入`null`为此参数。You should always pass in `null` for this parameter. 该方法的此实现始终返回一个空对象。This implementation of the method always returns an empty object. > [!NOTE] > 仅由控件开发人员使用此方法。This method is used only by control developers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是用于创建支持的数据类型的数组的帮助程序函数类。The method is a helper function that is used to create an array of data types supported by the class. 数组通常搜索以确定所需的数据类型的索引。The array is often searched to determine the index of a desired data type. 索引然后传递给方法来创建的相应的数据类型。The index is then passed to the method to create an of the corresponding data type. > [!NOTE] > 仅由控件开发人员使用此方法。This method is used only by control developers.
